instructions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spread melted butter in a 2-quart baking dish.
instructions.2: Heat peaches, 2/3 cup sugar, and water in a saucepan over medium-high heat, stirring occasional, until slightly thickened, about 5 minutes; remove from heat.
instructions.3: Mix flour, 1 cup sugar, milk, baking powder, and salt in a bowl until batter is combined; pour over melted butter in baking dish. Arrange peaches over the batter and pour any remaining liquid on top.
instructions.4: Bake in preheated oven until golden brown, 40 to 45 minutes.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the peaches from Step 2 being used?
Is peaches from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is flour from Step 3 still available in Step 4?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 4?
If we skip Step 2, is it still valid to arrange the peaches in Step 3?
Can we mix (Step 3) and bake (Step 4) at the same time?
